concept.title: Version 14 Unique Visitor Reports
concept.shortdesc: Describes the types of available Unique Visitor Reports.

entry.p: Displays how many unique visitors visited your site during this hour.

A visitor counts as an hourly unique visitor if this is the first time in the present hour they are visiting the site. For example, visiting a site once at 10:05, again at 10:45 and then again at 11:10, will show one hourly unique visitor during 10:00 and one hourly unique visitor during 11:00.

row.entry: Displays how many unique visitors visited your site during the current day. A visitor counts as a daily unique visitor if this is the first time today he or she visited the site.

entry.p: Displays how many people visited your site during the current week.
A visitor counts as a weekly unique visitor if this is the first time during the week that he or she visited the site.
Displays how many individuals visited your site during the current month.
A visitor counts as a monthly unique visitor if this is the first time in the month that he or she is visiting the site.
Displays how many individuals visited your site during the current quarter.
A visitor counts as a quarterly unique visitor if this is the first time in the quarter that he or she is visiting the site.
Displays how many individuals visited your site this year.
A visitor counts as a yearly unique visitor if this is the first time in the current year that he or she visited the site. If a visitor does not support cookies, he is not tracked in this report.
